name: Br Uvaiz
greetingText: We decided to make you a surprise!
wishText: You don't look a day over 25 :D
text1: It's your birthday ( a little belated) !!! :D
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Insha Allah to many more happy ones
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: We realised, We wanted to do something
outroText: I am very blessed to have the best father in law. I hope you liked the surprise
replayText: Click, if you want to watch it again.
